data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gill, Anthony C., Bogorodsky, Sergey V., Mal, Ahmad O. (2017): Review of Red Sea Xenisthmus Snyder (Teleostei: Gobioidei: Xenisthmidae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4286 (2): 203-214, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4286.2.4|22 occurrences
